form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, N-400 ( (Rev. 4-14-81)Y

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/22/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OMB NO. 1115-0009 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE Approval Expires 1/31/84 FEE STAMP APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION DEC 02 1981 12.7.83 Mail or take to: IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE ALIEN REGISTRATION ( Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration (See INSTRUCTIONS. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did not register, so state.) QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT. PLEASE PRINT OR Name DO, TOAI DINH TYPE.) No. A21202301, Section of Law 316(a) Date: 11-04-81 (Leave Blank) (1) My full true and correct name is TOAI DINH DO Full true name without abbreviations) (2) I now live at 3820 W. CLARK AVE (Number and street, BURBANK LOS ANGELES CA 91505 City county, state, zip code) (3) I was born on 05-22-15 in HANOT VIET NAM Month) Day (Year) City or town) ( County, province, or state) (Country) (4) I request that my name be changed to NONE (5) Other names I have used are: NONE (Include maiden name) Sex Male Female (6) Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? Yes No (If "Yes", explain fully) (7) Can you read and write English? Yes No (8) Can you speak English? Yes No (9) Can you sign your name in English? Yes No (10) My lawful admission for permanent residence was on 05 19 75 under the name of DO, TOAIDINA (Month) Day) Year) at LOS ANGELES CALIFORNIA ( City) (State) (11) (a) I have resided continuously in the United States since 06 19 75 (Month) (Day) (Year) (b) I have resided continuously in the State of CALIFORNIA since 06 19 75 (Month) (Day) (Year) (c) During the last five years I have been physically in the United States for a total of 60 months. FROM - To STREET ADDRESS CITY AND STATE (a) 10 1975 PRESENT TIME 3820 W CLARK AVE BURBANK CA (b) 19 19 (c) 19 19 (d) 19 19 (mooling (14) (a) Have you been out of the United States since your lawful admission as a permanent resident? Yes No If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence of less than 6 months, no matter how short it was. NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES (b) Since your lawful admission, have you been out of the United States for a period of 6 months of longer? Green RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES Yes No If "No", state "None"; If "Yes", fill in following information for every absence of more than 6 months. NAME OF SHIP OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES NONE 3 Form N-400 (Rev. 4-14-81) (1) for (OVER)
